synopsis.text:
It's just another ordinary day in a city marked by decline and poverty, where the young inhabitants have grown accustomed to their bleak reality. But when the enigmatic Haruko arrives, chaos ensues, disrupting the mundane lives of these youths.

Fast forward to the fourth season of FLCL, which serves as a sequel to FLCL Alternative, and witness the journey of three teenagers who have transitioned into adulthood. As they navigate the complexities of their new lives, the anime delves into the theme of what it truly means to be an adult.

Rewind to the events before the original FLCL, where the same city is on the brink of decay. The young residents have accepted their fate until Haruko's arrival shakes things up, plunging the city into a whirlwind of chaos.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
